## Trove.apply() method

Make a new Trove by applying a [TroveChange](./lib-base.trovechange.md) to this Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apply(change: any, borrowingRate?: Decimal): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  change | any | The change to apply. |
|  borrowingRate | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Borrowing rate to use when adding a borrowed amount to the Trove's debt. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
